short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read all latest news headlines from India and around the world on Oneindia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oneindia is one among the leading online portals in India, which brings to the readers the latest news on Politics, Sports, Current Affairs in India and around the world.
